Class System.Bus

  • java.lang.Object
    • System.Bus

  • public class System.Bus
extends java.lang.Object
    A 16-bit Data and 32-bit Address bus through which devices can communicate. In the interest of expandability, this bus can address 2^32 locations. The upper limit is for the programmer to decide.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      System.Bus()
      Constructor for the bus.

        Constructor for the bus.

    • Method Detail

      • connectDevice

        public void connectDevice(System.BusDevice device,
                          long address)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Connects the device to the bus using the range of addresses provided.
        Parameters:
        device - the Device to connect
        address - the address that the device will respond to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the address exceeds the addressing limits

      • readByte

        public int readByte(long address)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    System.InaddressableException
        Returns the byte mapped to the given address.
        Parameters:
        address - The address at which the device is mapped
        Returns:
        An integer containing the byte value
        Throws:
        System.InaddressableException - If the address does not map to any known device
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the address falls outside of the valid address range

      • writeByte

        public void writeByte(long address,
                      int value)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                      System.InaddressableException
        Writes the byte to the given address. The value will be truncated to its byte value
        Parameters:
        address - The address at which the device is mapped
        value - And integer containing the byte value
        Throws:
        System.InaddressableException - If the address does not map to any known device
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the address falls outside of the valid address range

      • inBounds

        public static boolean inBounds(long address)
        Whether the address is a valid location for the bus
        Parameters:
        address - The address to verify
        Returns:
        True if the address is in [0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFF], false otherwise
